articles.description: PETE JENSON IN SPAIN: The phrase most-often uttered around the club right now is a familiar one - Barcelona don't have any money. They are simply not able to compete with the big boys currently.
articles.content: At the end of last season Barcelona were confident that they would keep Lionel Messi. In the middle of this season they said they were hopeful of signing Erling Haaland. And as this campaign entered … [+5703 chars]
